#include "{{ c.Name }}.h"

#include <xstring>

#include <msclr\marshal_cppstd.h>


////////////////////// Functions //////////////////////
{% for fun in c.Functions -%}
{{ fun.ReturnManagedType }} {{ c.Name }}CPP::{{ fun.Name }}({% parametersManaged fun.Parameters %})
{
	try
	{
{% if fun.IsVoidReturn == false -%}
		{{ fun.ReturnNativeType }} _res = m_{{ c.Name }}->{{ fun.Name }}({% parametersCall fun.Parameters %});
		return {{ fun.ReturnManagedName }};
{% else -%}
		m_{{ c.Name }}->{{ fun.Name }}({% parametersCall fun.Parameters %});
{% endif -%}
	}
	catch (std::exception e)
	{
		throw gcnew System::Exception(gcnew System::String(e.what()));		
	}
}

{% endfor -%}
